malp.Entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • malp.Entities.Entity
      • malp.Entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    This class represents the entity controlled via the mouse and keyboard by the player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double angle
      The angle, in radians, that the player shoots arrows at.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image bow
      The image representing the bow.

      • Fields inherited from class malp.Entities.Entity

        alive, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int x, int y)
      Instantiates a new player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Renders the player animation, as defined Entity.draw(), followed by drawing the bow on top of the player, rotated to the angle.
      double getAngle()
      Gets the angle.
      void setAngle(double angle)
      Sets the angle.
      void update()
      This method is empty, as this entity is controlled via peripherals such as a mouse and keyboard.

      • Methods inherited from class malp.Entities.Entity

        getX, getY, isAlive, isCollided, kill, setX, setY

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void draw()
